attributes.action: Review the resignations tendered by those recently in the wake of the BBC2 prank calls row
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe those complainants' issues upon which this witch hunt was based on are not solely related to this issue, and those forced to resign resultant from the subsequent hysteria deserve to be shown support from the otherwise silent majority who do not support such media driven frenzy.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
